comments.body: Yeah. As soon as it will get into master I will make an update to the proposal of Integration testing with GCP (https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/AIRFLOW/AIP-4+Support+for+Integration+Tests?focusedCommentId=93324391#comment-93324391) and will resume the conversation. I want to update all our tests in all GCP properties to use this test_gcp_base.py - it makes our testing much easier and faster.

diffHunk:

            return True
        return False
